hero_images.name: Peru
hero_images.text: The Peru national football team that participated in the 1936 Berlin Olympics. The squad, also known as "The Black Roller" (Spanish: El Rodillo Negro), stands prior to its quarterfinals match against Austria. Front: Adelfo Magallanes, Jorge Alcalde, Teodoro Fernández, José Morales, and Alejandro Villanueva. Back: Carlos Tovar, Víctor Guarderas Lavalle, Juan Valdivieso, Arturo Fernández, Segundo Castillo, and Orestes Jordán.
